channel.title: "Mark Read"
channel.description:
If you click mark read at the bottom of a specific board index it marks read for both the index of that board and all sub boards. I am suggesting a profile option where you can choose to have it happen with both main board and sub board or just the main board.
I.E.
I don't generally look at the server developments unless it's one I noticed I have already posted on but I do look at the development team threads. I can go down to the bottom and lose my spot of checking threads on server development teams.

[quote=“Davidi2, post:3, topic:519136”]I want to be able to mark a topic as something that doesn’t show up in “Show new replies to your posts.”

For example, if I replied once to a topic and know I don’t care about it anymore, I want to be able to have it not show up when I click that button to see new replies.[/quote]
This. An unnotify button or something. I’ve been thinking about this for a long time and also thought about posting about it but i never got around to it.
